extension.summary: Specializes in Furk and Easynews. This add-on is intended for advanced Kodi users only. You must have a debrid service to use this add-on without Furk/Easynews.
extension.description: Specializes in Furk and Easynews(web) account access. Also utilizes Fenomscrapers for those without a Furk or Easynews(web) account. You must have a debrid service to use this add-on without Furk/Easynews. This add-on is intended for advanced Kodi users only. Please Note: This add-on is NOT an Exodus fork, and as such will behave differently to an Exodus fork.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news: INFO: For latest changes see Changelog within Tools of add-on.
